trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for embedded mail object collections in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor de componente para coleções de objeto de email inseridas em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor> class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection> object of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor> classe fornece uma interface do usuário para edição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> elementos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection> objeto do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objects define the content and format of the email notification messages that are sent by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>, and other controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objetos definem o conteúdo e o formato das mensagens de notificação de email que são enviadas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>e outros controles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> elements define the embedded objects within these email messages.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> elementos definem os objetos inseridos dentro dessas mensagens de email.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor> is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **EmbeddedObjects** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor> é invocado selecionando as reticências (**... **) no botão de **EmbeddedObjects** propriedade, em **MailDefinition**, no **propriedades** grade do visual designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> método edita o valor do objeto especificado usando o provedor de serviço especificado e o contexto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the collection to edit.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> da coleção a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor> class when the user selects the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **EmbeddedObjects** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>, or other control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor> classe quando o usuário seleciona o botão de reticências (**... **) no botão de **EmbeddedObjects** propriedade, em **MailDefinition**, no **propriedades** grade do visual designer, durante a criação de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>, ou outro controle que encapsula uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that is used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> que é usado para obter informações de contexto adicionais.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto implementando o <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> por meio do qual os serviços de edição podem ser obtidos.

trans-unit.source: The object to edit the value for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para o qual editar o valor.

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor do objeto especificado usando o provedor de serviços e o contexto especificados.

trans-unit.source: The new <paramref name="value" />; otherwise, if the value of the object has not changed, <paramref name="value" /> unchanged.
trans-unit.target: O novo <paramref name="value" />, caso contrário, se o valor do objeto não tiver sido alterado, <paramref name="value" /> inalterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanging%2A> method of the `context` parameter, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> chamadas de método o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanging%2A> método o `context` parâmetro e, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> método de base.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions that are thrown are propagated back to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Exceções geradas são propagadas de volta para o chamador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanged%2A> method of `context` is called when the editing is complete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanged%2A> método `context` é chamado quando a edição é concluída.
